name: TomatoScore
0:
”Alexa, open Tomato Score”
”Alexa, ask Tomato Score what is the score of "Star Wars"”
”Alexa, ask Tomato Score give me the score of "Empire Strikes Back"”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tomato score
des:
Tomato Score gives you the Rotten Tomatoes score for a given movie. 

Usage Examples:
1) "Alexa, open Tomato Score" or "Alexa, launch Tomato Score'.
 Alexa will respond by asking "What movie do you want to check?" And you respond by saying the title of a movie, for example "Star Wars". If the Tomato score exists for the movie, Alexa will tell you what it is. Otherwise, you will be told that the score/rating cannot be found.

2) "Alexa, ask Tomato Score what is the score of 'Star Wars'".

This skill uses the OMDb API. Please visit https://www.omdbapi.com/ for more info.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
